price: ហើយយើងបានផ្ដល់មុជីហ្សាត់ជាច្រើនដល់ពួកគេ ដោយ ក្នុងនោះមានការសាកល្បងយ៉ាងច្បាស់លាស់។
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
